inscription:
Inscription

in pen and brown ink: Laniara [mattress maker] / Quel da i sigilli [the maker of seals] / Horolagiaro [clock/watch maker] / Barigello [sheriff] / Adobatore [decorator] / Quel dalli fuochi artificiali [fireworks maker] / Quel delle feste [festival organizer] / Mercato d'animali (animal market) / Cavallarizo [horseman]

LRC, in dark brown: [10]
medium: Pen and brown ink and wash over red chalk on laid paper
provenance: Sale, Sotheby's, London, June 21, 1974, no. ?124, to Mathews; [Alister Mathews, Bournemouth, England, 1974; sold September 8, for £200, to Moir]; Alfred Moir, Santa Barbara (1974-d. 2010; bequeathed to MIA)
title: A City Square with Tradesmen
